text: Luís Caldas (17 December 1926 - 30 June 2012) was a Portuguese wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman middleweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Portuguese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Portugal Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon
title: Luís Caldas
